mapper.sql: record_id, amount, type, info_id, before_change_income, remark, souse_id, create_at, update_at, withdraw_to, withdraw_name, withdraw_account, commission_source_user, commission_got_user, commission_level, target_year_month
mapper.select:
select
from czb_income_log where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_settlement = 0

update czb_income_log
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
before_change_income = #{beforeChangeIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
souse_id = #{souseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update czb_income_log set amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, before_change_income = #{beforeChangeIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, souse_id = #{souseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, withdraw_to = #{withdrawTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_name = #{withdrawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_account = #{withdrawAccount,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT amount, before_change_income as beforeChangeIncome, remark , i.update_at as updateAt, i.create_at as createAt, withdraw_to as withdrawTo, withdraw_account as withdrawAccount, withdraw_name as withdrawName, commission_level as commissionLevel, commission_got_user as commissionGotUser, commission_source_user as commissionSourceUser, czb_user.user_account as userAccount, czb_user.user_name as userName from czb_income_log as i, czb_user_income_info as u, czb_user WHERE czb_user.user_id = commission_source_user AND u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.info_id=u.info_id AND i.type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and i.amount!=0 AND (i.is_settlement = 0 or i.is_settlement is null) ORDER BY i.create_at DESC

SELECT amount, before_change_income as beforeChangeIncome, remark , i.update_at as updateAt, i.create_at as createAt, withdraw_to as withdrawTo, withdraw_account as withdrawAccount, withdraw_name as withdrawName, commission_level as commissionLevel, commission_got_user as commissionGotUser, commission_source_user as commissionSourceUser from czb_income_log as i, czb_user_income_info as u WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.info_id=u.info_id AND i.type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and i.amount!=0 AND (i.is_settlement = 0 or i.is_settlement is null) ORDER BY i.create_at DESC

SELECT log.amount, log.before_change_income beforeChangeIncome, log.remark, log.souse_id souseId, log.create_at createAt, log.withdraw_to withdrawTo, log.withdraw_name withdrawName FROM czb_income_log log WHERE log.type = 1 AND is_settlement = 0
AND withdraw_to like concat('%', #{withdrawTo},'%')
AND withdraw_name LIKE concat('%', #{withdrawName},'%')
ORDER BY createAt DESC
